Description: US Buyers: No taxes, duties or brokerage fees Guitar comes with OHSC in excellent condition and cream pickguard. Pickguard never been installed. No holes in the body Overall condition: - Guitar is in very good to excellent condition - Neck is straight - Frets are in very good condition. Some light wear on the G String. All notes ring out properly all over the fret board. - All electronics work as they should - No buckle rash - Light surface scratches from playing, mostly invisible on the pictures - Worn finish on one very small spot just under the bridge pickup, also from playing - Small surface scratches, mostly invisible on the pictures - Light edgewear - A few very small bumps on the back of the body also hard to detect on the pictures Specifications: - Weight: 7 lbs 8 oz - Neck profile is close to a 50' neck profile - Burstbucker pickups - Rosewood fretboard - Kluson tuners - Thin faded finish and flame maple top - Weight relieved body Some suggestions: Please note that some settings on this guitar like action, intonation, neck adjustment etc .....may need to be adjusted to your specific style of playing. Also once you have received the guitar you should leave the instrument in the case for at least 6 hours, so the instrument can acclimate to its new environment Return and refund procedure: Item can be returned within 3 days of receipt. - Item arrived damaged or not as described: Full refund and seller pays for the return shipping costs - The customer didn't like the item (color, tone, neck size, weight etc....): Full refund less 10% restocking fee and buyer pays for the return shipping costs. - No partial refund. - Refund will be issued once the guitar is back in the sellers hand Carriers: - USPS for the United States - Canada Post for Canada
Title: 2007 Gibson Les Paul Standard Faded Honeyburst with OHSC
